Package gobblin.runtime.cli

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CliApplication
    An application that can be called by GobblinCli.
    EmbeddedGobblinCliFactory
    A factory for EmbeddedGobblin instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CliEmbeddedGobblin
    A CliApplication that runs a Gobblin flow using EmbeddedGobblin.
    CliOptions
    Utility class for parsing command line options for Gobblin cli jobs.
    ConstructorAndPublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory
    A helper class for automatically inferring Options from the constructor and public methods in a class.
    GobblinCli
    Instantiates a CliApplication and runs it.
    PublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory
    A helper class for automatically inferring Options from the public methods in a class.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    EmbeddedGobblinCliOption
    Specify additional information to use when building a CLI option from a method.
    EmbeddedGobblinCliSupport
    Specifies that the annotated constructor should be used to instantiate the EmbeddedGobblin for running from CLI.
    NotOnCli
    Specifies that the annotated method should not be offered as an option in the CLI.
